overview:
Alain Sylvain is the founder and chief executive of Sylvain Labs, a strategy and innovation consulting company. The company is a strategic planning resource for marketing and product development, working with clients including: Google, Target, Coca-Cola, IAC, GM, Nike, AB InBev, AOL, LVMH and others.

Prior to Sylvain Labs, Alain was managing director of Redscout, a brand strategy and innovation consultancy working with clients including Johnson & Johnson, Diageo, Del Monte, and others. Before that, Alain was a lead strategist at Mother New York, where he worked with brands including Johnson & Johnson, LVMH, Coca-Cola, New Balance and others. He previously held positions at The Martin Agency, Publicis, and SS+K. Alain is a frequent lecturer on brands and innovation. He sits on the board of VCUâ€™s Brandcenter and is a guest lecturer for Hyper Island. Alain has been featured in The Wall Street Journal, The New York Times, and other publications. He is also the co-founder of Feely.
